tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Cut out the geometric shapes from the layout sheet.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Fold the shapes so that the straight lines form a continuous path.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: What building did you end up with?

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: This is Big Ben.

tips.name: Tip 5
tips.text: You've already encountered Big Ben in this box. What time does the clock show now?

tips.name: Tip 6
tips.text: There are letters on the clock face too.

tips.name: Tip 7
tips.text: You need the letters indicated by the clock hands.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is TEA. Take films with letters TEA and attach to the envelope #2.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Navigate through each maze and retrieve two sequences of words that correspond to the correct route.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: The words correspond to the symbols on the time machine.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Using the sequences of words that were obtained, thread the ropes on the time machine through the corresponding holes.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The threaded ropes creates the numbers 2047.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Insert the gears correctly. The first and the last gear should point to the clock.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Set in series the correct numbers on the first gear, and see the letters on the last one.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is ATOM. Take films with letters ATOM and attach to the envelope #3.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: There are two gray shapes on the inside of the box. Using the puzzle pieces, reproduce these shapes, and put them on the layout.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: The symbols on the puzzle parts correspond to the drawings on paper squares.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: The red and black pointers, which are labeled with numbers, indicate the number of points in each sector of the layout where a paper square should be placed.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: You need four light bulbs, to which both the red and black wires fit, without interrupting along the way.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is LINK. Take films with the letters LINK and attach to the envelope #4.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Insert the wooden parts into the time machine.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Connect the rubber bands to each of the two pins, the sum of the numbers of which is fifty or seventy. There are thirteen such pairs.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: You got four letters - M C M L.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: These are roman numerals. On the inner sticker in the box there are rules for converting Roman numbers to Arabic.

tips.name: Tip 5
tips.text: One thousand nine hundred and fifty.

tips.name: Tip 6
tips.text: Scroll the gears and get the word.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is FLIGHT. Take films with the letters FLIGHT and attach to the envelope #5.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Combine the symbols on the time machine into six groups of four symbols of the same kind. Each group has an extra element.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Groups: transport, letters, signs, tools, light sources, shapes.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Extra elements: airplane, letter Q, question mark, shovel, light bulb, circle.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: In the professorâ€™s project, the extra symbols correspond to the necessary letters.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is SCHEME.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: What fuel is used in the time machine?

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: In your time it is raisins, but what was it in the past?

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is GRAPE.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Align the new wood piece with any of the old combed gears.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Empty space forms shapes.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is TETRIS.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Using the professor's chart as reference, recreate the details of Big Ben with precision.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: You already saw this drawing finished in your time.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Red lines indicate the correct letters.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is MINUS.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Lay out the calendar sheets in the order of the days of the week.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: You got a famous numeral sequence.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is PI.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Write the answers to each point of the plan on the corresponding tapes, then cut them out.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Insert the cut tapes into the holes in the time machine.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Align the pattern on the tapes with the pattern on the time machine to determine the letters you need.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is SETUP. Take films with the letters SETUP and attach to the envelope #6.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Replace the gear on the time machine.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: You need the year where the Professor lives.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Year - two thousand and forty-seven.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is BOUND. Take films with the letters BOUND and attach to the envelope #7.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Make the corresponding calculations according to the task.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is SIX.
